results.title: Metformin attenuates the D-galactose-induced aging process via the UPR through the AMPK/ERK1/2 signaling pathways
results.text_hl: Reversing these harmful effects through the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suggests its involvement in restoring the antioxidant status and protein homeostasis related to the underlying pathology of @<m>DISEASE_Presbycusis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011304 @@@presbycusis@@@.
